questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and decoration
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A decorative piece on a wall

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A landscape
C) A piece of wall art
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A painting of a bird
C) A window
D) A sign

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A body of water
C) A red wooden wall
D) A crowd of people

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person
B) A piece of furniture
C) A painted wooden plank
D) A flower

What type of bird is depicted in the painting?
A) Eagle
B) Pelican
C) Sparrow
D) Owl

What is the color of the wall behind the painting?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red-Brown
D) Yellow

How many wooden planks make up the painting?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the color of the bird in the painting?
A) Red and yellow
B) Black and white
C) Blue and green
D) Brown and orange

What kind of texture does the wall have?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and wooden
C) Metallic
D) Glassy

What is the orientation of the wooden planks in the painting?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What is the primary color of the wooden planks in the painting?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the condition of the edges of the wooden plank?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Jagged and worn
C) Sharp and clean
D) Rounded and soft

What is the bird in the painting doing?
A) Flying
B) Sitting
C) Eating
D) Singing

What is the main color contrast in the painting?
A) Blue and yellow
B) Black, orange and gray
C) Red and green
D) Purple and orange

What is the texture of the bird painting?
A) Smooth and glossy
B) Rough and textured
C) Soft and velvety
D) Metallic

What is the shape of the wooden plank?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Irregular

What is the main artistic technique used in the bird painting?
A) Watercolor
B) Oil painting
C) Stencil art
D) Digital art

How many colors are primarily used in the bird painting?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the relationship between the center and the background elements?
A) The painting is part of the wall
B) The person is standing in front of the wall
C) The car is parked by the wall
D) The tree is growing next to the wall
